['Reduced movement speed from 305 to 300.', 'Reduced  Ice Shards damage from 70/140/210/280 to 60/120/180/240.', ' Snowball\nCan no longer pull in allies affected by  Chronosphere or  Black Hole.\nReduced gather radius from 400 to 350.', 'Can no longer pull in allies affected by  Chronosphere or  Black Hole.', 'Reduced gather radius from 400 to 350.']

['Increased  Ice Shards mana cost from 90 on each level to 100/105/110/115.', 'Reduced  Snowball stationary time from 4 to 3.', ' Frozen Sigil no longer pierces spell immunity.', ' Walrus Kick now deals 200 damage.']

['Reduced mana cost from 120 to 90.', 'Reduced cooldown from 18/16/14/12 to 19/16/13/10.', 'Increased vision duration from 0.5 to 2.', ' Ice Shards
Reduced mana cost from 120 to 90.
Reduced cooldown from 18/16/14/12 to 19/16/13/10.
Increased vision duration from 0.5 to 2.', " Snowball
Now travels at a constant speed of 675, instead of 150% of Tusk's speed + 100 per gathered hero.
No longer automatically gathers units within a 100 radius upon cast.
Tusk can now add allies to Snowball while it is moving (allies can jump in by themselves as well while it travels).", "Now travels at a constant speed of 675, instead of 150% of Tusk's speed + 100 per gathered hero.", 'No longer automatically gathers units within a 100 radius upon cast.', 'Tusk can now add allies to Snowball while it is moving (allies can jump in by themselves as well while it travels).', "Added  Aghanim's Scepter Upgrade for Tusk: Grants Tusk the  Walrus Kick ability."]

['Increased projectile speed from 900 to 1100.', 'Increased shard duration from 5 to 7 seconds.', ' Ice Shards
Increased projectile speed from 900 to 1100.
Increased shard duration from 5 to 7 seconds.', ' Walrus PUNCH!
Is now an enemy target ability, and is auto-castable.
Reduced cooldown from 25/20/15 to 20/16/12.', 'Is now an enemy target ability, and is auto-castable.', 'Reduced cooldown from 25/20/15 to 20/16/12.']

['No longer stops when it hits a hero.', 'Now travels until reaching the cast location and creates its shards there.', 'Increased cast range from 1500 to 1800.', 'No longer destroys trees.', ' Ice Shards
No longer stops when it hits a hero.
Now travels until reaching the cast location and creates its shards there.
Increased cast range from 1500 to 1800.
No longer destroys trees.', ' Snowball
Increased bonus speed per hero from 75 to 100.

['Reduced  Snowball cooldown from 21 to 21/20/19/18.', 'Reduced  Walrus PUNCH! cooldown from 30/24/18 to 25/20/15.']

['Converted to two-part ability. Main to begin rolling in-place, sub-ability to launch. Will automatically launch 4 seconds after using the main ability.', 'Reduced gather range from 200 + 40 per second to 100.', 'Can now manually add allied units within 400 radius to the snowball by right-clicking them', 'Each allied hero inside the Snowball now increases its damage by 20/30/40/50.', 'Each allied hero inside the Snowball now increases its speed by 75.', "Base damage of 80/120/160/200 and base speed of 150% of Tusk's movement speed still stay.", " Snowball
Converted to two-part ability. Main to begin rolling in-place, sub-ability to launch. Will automatically launch 4 seconds after using the main ability.
Reduced gather range from 200 + 40 per second to 100.
Can now manually add allied units within 400 radius to the snowball by right-clicking them
Each allied hero inside the Snowball now increases its damage by 20/30/40/50.
Each allied hero inside the Snowball now increases its speed by 75.
Base damage of 80/120/160/200 and base speed of 150% of Tusk's movement speed still stay."]

[' Snowball Secondary units hit by the Snowball now take the same impact as the primary unit.', ' Walrus PUNCH!\nNo longer deals 400% crit to targets below 50% health. It now always deals the base crit.\nIncreased base critical damage from 300% to 350%.', 'No longer deals 400% crit to targets below 50% health. It now always deals the base crit.', 'Increased base critical damage from 300% to 350%.']
[' Frozen Sigil now requires 3/3/4/4 attacks to be destroyed, instead of having 200/220/240/260 health (heroes hurt it for 1, others for 0.25).']
['Reduced  Snowball cooldown from 24 to 21.']
